item.title: Manjaro
item.author: 作者
item.description: Configure manjaro Change sources rank mirrors 1 2 sudo pacman-mirrors -i -c China -m rank sudo pacman -Syu change the gem source 1 gem sources --add https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/rubygems/ --remove https://rubygems.org/ change the npm source 1 2 3 npm install -g nrm // 全局安装nrm模块 nrm ls // 显示所有可用的源 nrm use taobao // 切换到淘宝
